sen.j: 澤村源之助（さわむら げんのすけ）は歌舞伎役者の名跡
sen.e: Gennosuke SAWAMURA was a professional name of a kabuki actor.
Gennosuke SAWAMURA was a professional name of a kabuki actor.
Gennosuke SAWAMURA was a professional name of a kabuki actor.

sen.j: 澤村源之助 (初代) 澤村宗十郎 (4代目)の前名
sen.e: Gennosuke SAWAMURA the first was the former name of Sojuro SAWAMURA the fourth.
Gennosuke SAWAMURA the first was the former name of Sojuro SAWAMURA the fourth.
Gennosuke SAWAMURA the first was the former name of Sojuro SAWAMURA the fourth.

sen.j: 澤村源之助 (2代目) 助高屋高助 (3代目)の前名
sen.e: Gennosuke SAWAMURA the second was the former name of Takasuke SUKETAKAYA the third.
Gennosuke SAWAMURA the second was the former name of Takasuke SUKETAKAYA the third.
Gennosuke SAWAMURA the second was the former name of Takasuke SUKETAKAYA the third.

sen.j: 澤村源之助 (3代目) 幕末期の歌舞伎役者
sen.e: Gennosuke SAWAMURA the third was a kabuki actor in the end of the Edo period.
Gennosuke SAWAMURA the third was a kabuki actor in the end of the Edo period.
Gennosuke SAWAMURA the third was a kabuki actor in the end of the Edo period.

sen.j: 澤村源之助 (4代目) 「田圃の太夫」と呼ばれた名優。
sen.e: Gennosuke SAWAMURA the fourth was a master of stage, called "Tanbo no tayu (a performer from a paddy area)".
Gennosuke SAWAMURA the fourth was a master of stage, called "Tanbo no tayu" (a performer from a paddy area).
sen.cmt: 括弧の位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: Gennosuke SAWAMURA the fourth was a master of stage, called "Tanbo no tayu" (a performer from a paddy area).
He was best at playing a wicked old woman.
He was best at playing a wicked old woman.
He was best at playing a wicked old woman.

sen.j: 澤村源之助 (5代目) 劇作家木村錦花の子 四代目の養子となる。
sen.e: Gennosuke SAWAMURA the fifth was a son of Kinka KIMURA, a playwright, and was adopted by Gennosuke SAWAMURA the fourth.
Gennosuke SAWAMURA the fifth was a son of Kinka KIMURA, a playwright, and was adopted by Gennosuke SAWAMURA the fourth.
